chapter.title: Required libraries
chapter.para:
These libraries are required to build and install PDF Editor:
qt3Qt GUI Toolkit (Version 3.x)
qsaQt Script for Applications (Version 1.1.4 or newer - for QT3)
boostBoost C++ Libraries (smart_ptr, iostreams)
xlibX Window System libraries
For building kernel tests, you need to have CPPunit installed

For rebuilding documentation from DocBook .xml files, gmake (GNU make) is required and you also need:
For generating HTML : either docbook2html or xsltproc from libxslt and docbook stylesheets
For generating PDF : xsltproc from libxslt, docbook stylesheets and Apache FOP from http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/
If some of the required dependencies is missing, documentation in appropriate format will not be generated. In distribution archive, HTML documentation is already generated.

chapter.title: Installing and compiling from source
chapter.formalpara: Compiling from source In CVS root (or root of distribution archive) type make to compile PDF Editor and re-genereate documentation (if needed)
Installing from source In CVS root (or root of distribution archive) type make install to install PDF Editor
